constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 169 (Tuesday, September 28, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
Mr. FERGUSON:
H.R. 5408.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Clause 1 of section 8 of article I of the Constitution, to
``provide for the common defense and general welfare of the
United States.''
[Page H5506]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

title: For the relief of Michael Janssen and Steven Passantino.
